Documentation.UserDocu:
Quantity defined by a value and a unit.
The following constructors are supported: Quantity() -- empty constructor Quantity(Value) -- empty constructor Quantity(Value,Unit) -- empty constructor Quantity(Quantity) -- copy constructor Quantity(string) -- arbitrary mixture of numbers and chars defining a Quantity
returns a quantity with the translation factor and a string with the prevered unit

returns a floating point value as the provided unit
Following parameters are allowed: getValueAs('m/s') # unit string to parse getValueAs(2.45,1) # translatrion value and unit signature getValueAs(FreeCAD.Units.Pascal) # predefined standard units getValueAs(Qantity('N/m^2')) # a quantity getValueAs(Unit(0,1,0,0,0,0,0,0)) # a unit
Numeric Value of the Quantity (in internal system mm,kg,s)
